Replace.Text: Farms give standard adjacency bonuses to Commercial Centers, small adjacency bonuses to Theater Squares, culture bombs on unclaimed territories, and +1 [ICON_Production] Production after researching Humanism, +1 [ICON_Production] Production after researching Computers After +2 [ICON_Production] Production. Cities gain borders -50% faster.

Gary features improved. Unlocked by the civic "Humanism". +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +1 Charisma. +1 [ICON_Culture] culture if adjacent to the entertainment area; +1 [ICON_Culture] culture if adjacent to the theater square; +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins when adjacent to a community; after unlocking the "flying" technology Finally, tourism performance can be provided based on cultural output. Only one can be built per city. Cannot be built on Flood Plains, Desert or Desert Hills terrain.
Gary Medieval unique ranged unit that replaces the crossbowman. +1 [ICON_Movement] to movement, [ICON_Strength] to higher attack. No movement penalty for moving in hills, forests and rainforests.

When the farm is adjacent to the commercial center, it provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins +2; when it is adjacent to the theater square, it provides [ICON_Culture] culture +1, and provides tourism achievements after possessing the "flying" technology. -30% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building buildings.

All land ranged units +1 vision and range, all ranged units combat experience +30%. All land ranged units gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Attack when fighting major civilizations. Every time you train a ranged unit, you get another ranged unit.
Feng Shan, the wise king, has boundless wisdom
General Feng Shan, seal the wolf to live in Xu

The creative Feng Shan turns whimsy into reality. Under his leadership, tens of thousands of acres of fertile land turned into a wonderful picture scroll. In Feng Shan's view, high-quality farmland is the best recognition of a leader's ability, and Feng Shan can also balance culture and economy between the fields.

Farms, the core and lifeblood of Gary's civilization. Garies can benefit commerce and culture in farming. Water mills in river cities allow Feng Shan to pay for faith purchases without building holy sites. The Garies love peace, but if war must be waged, the loyal explorers will fight bravely against powerful enemies.
General Feng Shan no longer sticks to peacekeeping, but turns to show his sharpness. The strong bow army he leads will sweep away all obstacles and conquer more cities.

Farms, the core and lifeblood of Gary's civilization. Garies can benefit commerce and culture in farming. Water mills in river cities allow Feng Shan to pay for faith purchases without building holy sites. Once the war started, the symphony of artillery announced another victory.

Feng Shan, even though he looks tall and reminds people of Zhucheng Tyrannosaurus, he is always approachable and has a pure heart. Political allies and adversaries alike think highly of him. To a large extent, it is because he led Gary through a lot of hunger, facing the canteens and takeaways where there is not enough to eat.

Feng Shan is a native of Zhucheng. Due to the influence of the older generation in his family, he has always cared about the world since he was a child. Show enthusiasm for exploring exotic mountains and rivers. In order to explore what youth is, he left his hometown and traveled around the world as an adult, eager to understand the essence of life.

During the period of compulsory education, Feng Shan showed his extraordinary talents in mathematics and English. As a result, the teacher was asked countless times by his questions, and Feng Shan was even able to teach his peers as a teacher in the subsequent question-and-answer class.

After high school life ended, Feng Shan entered her ideal university with excellent grades. Since then, he has become obsessed with video games. This caused his talents to be neglected, and his brilliance was gradually buried over time.
One day, he awakened in the quilt under the bridge. He regrouped, decided to return to his original intention, and tried to travel the world like an explorer.

After regaining his original intention, he first came to the long-awaited Kama University. He praised the scenery here very much, but at the same time he also noticed the incompetence of the government and the difficulties of the people here. This made him eager to return to his hometown.

After traveling, Feng Shan believes that if the hometown is anemic, the status quo cannot be changed. So he bravely took up the banner of revitalization, and became a leader after going through obstacles. Then he started drastic reforms and actively led the people to build their homes.

What Feng Shan has done has won the support and loyalty of the people of Zhucheng. Finally, in a certain year that we don't know, the small county town in the past has become a superpower that everyone yearns for and stands in the center of the world.

Feng Shan has experienced lows in popular morale, military victories and defeats, and cooperation and coordination with impatient allies. Everyone praised his wisdom, and his people proudly called themselves "Gary". (This article is purely fictitious)
Gary civilization is a purely fictional civilization. Compiled according to Feng Shan's daily behavior habits and hobbies.
When playing the Gary civilization, pay special attention to where the farms are built.
Farm culture bombs allow players to gain a large amount of territory in the early stages.
When Feng Shan is the leader, pay attention to the cooperation between the commercial center, the theater square and the farm.
The combination of the three can make Gary's business culture flourish. In addition, the productivity provided by the farm can also complement the construction speed.

The special feature of Fengshan's ability is that the farm adjacent to the theater square can provide tourism performance. Therefore, the earlier the "flying" technology is researched, the greater Gary's advantage will be, and the easier it is to win the cultural victory.
However, don't rely too much on farms, players still need other improvements and balanced development of regional buildings.
Explorer, the prototype is the best AD hero explorer Ezreal in Feng Shan's favorite game "League of Legends".

Explorers are good at traveling through complex terrain without being affected and have stronger self-protection capabilities, so they can ban stragglers to explore the world and establish diplomatic relations with new civilizations.

One of Feng Shan's favorite sports and leisure projects. Billiards is one of the ball games. Athletes use a club longer than 91.4 centimeters on the pool table to make the target ball into the bag by hitting the white cue ball according to certain rules.

Feng Shan, even though he looks tall and reminds people of Zhucheng Tyrannosaurus, he is always approachable and has a pure heart. Political allies and adversaries alike think highly of him. To a large extent, it is because he led Gary through a lot of hunger, facing the canteens and takeaways where there is not enough to eat.

Southeast of Shandong Peninsula, the junction of Taiyi Mountains and Jiaowei Plain
The total area is 2183 square kilometers
You can say that I have problems, but you can't say that I'm good at the game!
I am very good at technology now!
Sorry, but I'm not full yet.
Let's go, let's take a shower together!
Great, let's make an exception and go to a restaurant today!
Oh well, it looks like you're not hungry yet.
I see you are full and full!
You must not be allowed to bully the people!
Thank you so much! You shouldn't mind if your envoy gained a few pounds, right?
No, I don't want to invite your people to dinner.
Please do not hesitate to accept the gift from our mission. We brought the famous Weihe carp, yellow cherries and chestnuts.
Joke, I have eaten more rice than you have traveled.
Your people don't have enough food and clothing, and you don't care about it! (condemns you)
Hello, my name is Feng Shan. Come and taste the best quality food in our country.
There is a city near us. Want to come and visit? I wish you good food and drink.
Can I go to your house for dinner? I just take one bite, really, one bite.
Your people are blessed, praise you.
Those guys are running out of food and I hope we don't get into that situation.
Have you got a meal yet?
Eating well and dressing warmly is the best policy.
We still have food, not afraid of you.
Ah, come on, come on. I treat you to a good meal.
Wait a second, the rice is not cooked yet.
Can your people still have food? It looks like you're using the grain in the wrong place.
Sorry, I need to lose weight.
Let's go, let's take a shower together!
Meet our strong bow team! Then, surrender!
very good! I will treat you well!
Take it, we have brought a gift of strong bows and cannons.
Those who do not think about making progress will eventually be eliminated! (condemns you)
Hello, I am General Feng Shan. Will you be a strong man worthy of respect, or a submissive rat?
There is a city near us. Want to come and visit? Have fun.
We smart people don't speak dark words, let's show our cards.
Who do you want to hit today?
You are a strong man worthy of respect, just like me.
After all, they are ordinary people. Poor and ridiculous.
Let us unite with blood and fight against each other!
Don't cause unnecessary disputes, it will not benefit you.
Try to get a high [ICON_Culture] culture, like civs with a lower [ICON_Culture] than your own, and dislike civs with a higher [ICON_Culture] than you.
Stop rolling! Time to lie flat!
You're doing pretty well, keep playing badly!
Will create a large number of ranged units, respecting civilizations that follow their lead. Hates civilizations with weak ranged units.
Do you have the nerve to show off your flamboyant fists and embroidered legs? Stop being a sensationalist!
Movement immobility penalty in forests and rainforests.
No movement penalty for moving on hills.
No movement penalty for moving in hills, forests and rainforests.
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting major civilizations.

Trust your whimsy, Feng Shan. under your leadership. Tens of thousands of acres of fertile land will become an amazing picture scroll. Your outstanding personality will help you make allies as you explore the world. With the power of unity, you will lead the people to glory, and history will remember your name and great achievements.

General Feng Shan, lead the soldiers to expand the territory! All the enemy's resistance is futile in the face of your strong bow. The point of your sword is the heart of the soldiers! Fight for a more glorious country!
